attributes.action: support establishment of the first national anti-bullying centre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With suicide statistics showing that in the UK at least 16 children kill themselves each year because they are being bullied, we feel it's time our efforts get support from the PM.

We are looking to set up the first National Anti-Bullying Centre in the UK that will bring bullies and their victims together in an environment that shapes attitudes and changes behaviours through involvement in martial arts.
